title: How to make filthy water drinkable
description: Too much of the world lacks access to clean drinking water. Engineer Michael Pritchard did something about it -- inventing the portable Lifesaver filter, which can make the most revolting water drinkable in seconds. An amazing demo from TEDGlobal 2009.
author: Michael Pritchard
keywords: TED, talks, business, demo, design, global issues, invention, technology, water
